main.name: Category
main.description: A `Category` represents a type of objects in the Game, e.g. the terrain or backgrounds in a sidescroller game. The methods described here are standard ones, the rest of the implementation is up to the plugin.

children.name: type
children.description: The type of the plugin. Possible values are: 'assets', 'sound', 'camera', 'colliders', 'draw', 'world'.

arguments.name: objects
arguments.description: The objects from this Category's part of the current Scene.

children.name: Update
children.description: Update this Category and its objects. Not required.

children.name: Draw
children.description: Draw the objects of this Category. Not required

arguments.name: game
arguments.description: The Game object. `Game.draw` is where you should be for drawing.
